attributes.action: END THE BEDROOM TAX AND REPAY TAXES TAKEN BACK TO VICTIMS
attributes.additional_details: THIS POLICY IS CAUSING MANY PEOPLE TO GET BEHIND WITH RENT . TAXING AND TAKING MONEY OFF OF PEOPLES BENEFITS WHO ARE ALREADY IN DIRE POVERTY AND STRUGGLING WITH MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES. JUST THE MERE THOUGHT OF BEING BEHIND WITH RENT CAN MAKE ANYONE WITH ISSUES SUICIDAL. YOU IMMEDIATELY GET BEHIND WITH THE RENT AS THE BENEFIT GETS PAYED ABOUT 8WKS AFTER YOU APPLY FOR IT.
attributes.background: END THE BEDROOM TAX AND REVERT TO RENT GOING STRAIGHT TO LANDLORDS .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action: 

Revoke the bedroom tax: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300849

Pay Universal Credit from Day One: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305875
